name: Alex Vinyas
description: Alex Vi√±as is a Business Developer at CoW DAO (MEV Blocker & CoW Swap).  CoW Protocol is a spinoff of GnosisDAO that aims to build a batch settlement layer for decentralized trading across all EVM chains with the goal of making both trading and the market more efficient while also getting rid of MEV. Prior to joining the CoWs, Alex worked as a finance & innovation consultant specialized in enterprise blockchain solutions for leading institutions in Spain.
